class messages;

Class template {{tt|std::messages}} is a standard locale facet that encapsulates retrieval of strings from message catalogs, such as the ones provided by GNU [https://www.gnu.org/s/gettext/ gettext] or by POSIX [https://pubs.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/9699919799/functions/catgets.html {{tt|catgets}}].

The source of the messages is implementation-defined.

{{inheritance diagram/std-messages}}

===Specializations===
The standard library is guaranteed to provide the following specializations (they are {{rlp|locale|required to be implemented by any locale object}}):

{{dsc header|locale}}
{{dsc|{{c/core|std::messages&lt;char&gt;}}|accesses narrow string message catalog}}
{{dsc|{{c/core|std::messages&lt;wchar_t&gt;}}|accesses wide string message catalog}}
{{dsc end}}
